lines.text: Hello, all you happy people. You know what? I'm the hero.

[after dropping a huge boulder on the wolf]
Yes, you're right. It is gruesome.
You stay here while I go and call the cops. Now promise me you won't move.
Uh, okay, bub.
[aside, to camera]
Sucker.
[back to Droopy]
I'll stay right here. I promise, I won't move a inch.

[leaving]
Okay. Now don't move.

[as soon as Droopy leaves, the Wolf goes out the window, takes a taxi to the train station, takes a train to the docks, takes a boat to the airport, and takes a plane to a remote cabin, where he finds... ]
You moved, didn't you?
[the Wolf freaks out, binds and gags Droopy, then runs out the cabin and takes the entire trip in reverse back to the apartment, where he again finds... ]
Enjoy your trip?
Peek-a-boo.
Now listen, Hockshaw. I'm plenty fed up with this chasing stuff, see? You come one step closer and... and I'll jump! And I will, too.
[the wolf is trying to hide from Droopy, but he appears behind him]
Guess who?
[the wolf runs off]
I surprise him like this all through the picture.
Here we go again. Boo!

[about Droopy who appears no matter where the Wolf goes]
I just left this guy tied up.
[stammering]
How did you... When... How... Where...
[in Droopy's face]
Listen, doc! How did you get back here anyways?
Now, let's not get nosy, bub.
